data.prayer: the state of Transcarpathia has (about) 45,008 people who know Jesus, 858,416 people who know about him culturally, and 338,476 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Transcarpathia, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 45,008 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Transcarpathia.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, there are 858,416 people in the state of Transcarpathia who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 45,008 believers in Transcarpathia against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, remember the Pashtun, Southern people. Make the Pashtun, Southern people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Transcarpathia that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Transcarpathia prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Transcarpathia, Ukraine to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

location.name: Transcarpathia
location.people_groups_list: Bashkir, Kurd, Kurmanji, Lak, Jew, Karaite, Kazakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bashkir (3,800), Kurd, Kurmanji (1,900), Lak (900), Jew, Karaite (1,200), Kazakh (5,000)
